edu.ucla.sspace.dependency
Interface DependencyPathAcceptor

All Known Implementing Classes:
MaximumMiniparTemplateAcceptor, MediumMiniparTemplateAcceptor, MediumPennTemplateAcceptor, MinimumMiniparTemplateAcceptor, MinimumPennTemplateAcceptor, UniversalPathAcceptor
public interface DependencyPathAcceptor

An interface for deciding whether a provided path is valid for further processing.

Method Summary
 boolean accepts(DependencyPath path)
          Returns true if the path is valid according to this acceptor's standards
 int maxPathLength()
          Returns the maximum path length allowed by this acceptor.
 

Method Detail

accepts

boolean accepts(DependencyPath path)
Returns true if the path is valid according to this acceptor's standards

Parameters:
path - a dependency path
Returns:
true if the path is valid

maxPathLength

int maxPathLength()
Returns the maximum path length allowed by this acceptor.

Returns:
the length above which no path will be accepted
